Dataset brief description: This dataset contains information on public procurements conducted through Prozorro, Ukraine's transparent online procurement system, from its launch in February 2015 to December 2019. The dataset is divided into two main files: one detailing competitive procurements with all their participants, and another listing all suppliers who were awarded contracts (both competitive and non-competitive). It covers approximately 4 million procurements from 40,000 public entities.
